title: Sound On: Taliban Evolution, Afghan Evacuation (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: Taliban Evolution, Afghan Evacuation (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Former India Ambassador and 9/11 Commissioner, Tim Roemer, Ward Carroll, retired F-14 radar intercept officer, author, and host of the Ward Carroll YouTube channel, and Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
